Are you sure about divine protection? Miria's purple lightning hurt so much, I couldn't move my body.=你确定神的保护吗？米莉亚的紫色闪电太刺痛了，我无法移动我的身体。
Don't talk like that - you're a holy knight! Gosh, you really need to learn to persevere... Your big sister Miria spoiled you rotten, didn't she?=别这么说-你是个神圣的骑士！天哪，你真的需要学会坚持。。。你姐姐Miria把你宠坏了，是吗？
You don't have to say it like that... Ugh... That's not...true...=你不必那样说。。。呃。。。那不是。。。符合事实的
Hell beetles... They're dangerous on land, but I especially don't want to deal with them around these swamps...=地狱甲虫。。。它们在陆地上很危险，但我尤其不想在沼泽地附近与它们打交道。。。
If you can't avoid their attacks in the mud, you can strike them right as they come at you.=如果你无法避免他们在泥泞中的攻击，你可以在他们向你袭来时直接攻击他们。
<b>Thunder Sword Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a thunder sword crystal\r\n will infuse your weapon with the power of lightning for a short time.\r\n You can shock weak enemies to stop them in their tracks\r\n and deal massive damage to\r\n aquatic monsters, insects, birds or enemies who wear armor.=<b>雷剑水晶</b>\r\n 收集雷霆剑水晶\n将在短时间内给你的武器注入闪电的力量。\n你可以震慑弱小的敌人，阻止他们前进\n并对其造成巨大损害\n水生怪物、昆虫、鸟类或穿盔甲的敌人。
Your weapon has been infused with Lightning magic=你的武器被注入了闪电魔法

My fellow fairies and I live in a forest in the mountains far northeast of here.=我和我的妖精们住在这里东北偏僻山区的一片森林里。
Mountains far northeast... Aren't those mountains super tall...?=远在东北的山脉。。。那些山不是很高吗。。。？
Yes, they are. My ancestors lived quietly in that forest surround by mountains. It was a peaceful land very few approached.=是的。我的祖先安静地生活在群山环绕的森林里。这是一片很少有人接近的宁静之地。
Yet suddenly, ferocious monsters began to appear... Just like this area.=然而突然，凶猛的怪物开始出现。。。就像这个地区。
So our ancestors climbed the mountain and prayed. Then God came down from the heavens before them...=所以我们的祖先爬上山祈祷。然后上帝在他们面前从天而降。。。
...and drove away the monsters with a dazzling light, shining like the sun.=...用耀眼的光芒赶走了怪物，像太阳一样闪耀。
Well, that's the folklore that's been passed down in our village through the ages, but God really does periodically come to the forest to put up barriers and drive away foreign invaders with magic.=好吧，这是我们村子里流传多年的民间传说，但上帝确实会定期来到森林里设置屏障，用魔法赶走外国侵略者。
Huh... To be honest, it didn't really hit me even after I was chosen to be a holy knight, but... I guess God really does exist.=呵呵。。。说实话，即使在我被选为神圣骑士后，我也没有真正受到打击，但是。。。我想上帝真的存在。
Yes, but unlike what you humans believe, God isn't actually all-powerful...=是的，但和你们人类所相信的不同，上帝并不是万能的。。。
Our God is probably more like a high-ranking spirit or something close to a wraith... No, I shouldn't think like that - it's disrespectful...=我们的神可能更像是一个高级精灵或是一个接近幽灵的东西。。。不，我不应该那样想-这是不尊重。。。
In any case, God uses holy light magic to keep the balance between living creatures and protect us, just like the myth says.=在任何情况下，上帝使用圣光魔法来保持生物之间的平衡并保护我们，就像神话所说的那样。
God wants peace for this world and its inhabitants, and we fairies help our God by collecting information from various places, sometimes becoming God's hands and feet. That's how we return the favor for God protecting us.=上帝希望这个世界和它的居民和平，我们妖精通过从不同的地方收集信息来帮助我们的上帝，有些地方次 成为神的手和脚。这就是我们回报上帝保护我们的方式。
I see... So what kind of person... What kind of God is he?=我懂了。。。那么什么样的人。。。他是什么样的上帝？
I don't mean to toot my own horn, but I was one of the most outstanding among the young fairies of my village. I wasn't just made God's servant, I was given a name.=我不是故意吹嘘自己，但我是村里最杰出的小妖精之一。我不仅仅是上帝的仆人，我还被赋予了一个名字。
God always takes the form of a woman when she appears in our village. She looks dignified, but she's also very kind.=当女人出现在我们村子里时，上帝总是以女人的形象出现。她看起来很端庄，但也很善良。
Oh? So she was a Goddess... W-Wait, does that mean the holy sisters at church aren't God's wives, then...?=哦所以她是一位女神。。。等等，这是否意味着教堂里的神圣姐妹不是上帝的妻子，那么。。。？
She may often appear as female, but she's able to take many different forms, so I don't know if that's her true form.=她可能经常以女性的身份出现，但她能够采取许多不同的形式，所以我不知道这是否是她的真实形式。
*Chuckle* She can be mischievous, too. One time, she surprised me by transforming herself to look like me...=*笑吧，她也可能很淘气。有一次，她让我惊讶，她把自己变成了我的样子。。。
Wow... Really...?=哇！真正地
One day, God told us that the world would soon be filled with evil power and that monsters would run rampant. She even told us that the seal the previous holy knight put on the Darkfiend Dragon is on the verge of being broken...=有一天，上帝告诉我们，世界很快就会充满邪恶的力量，怪物会猖獗。她甚至告诉我们前一位神圣骑士戴在黑暗之龙上的封印即将被打破。。。
That's why she gave me the duty to look for the new savior - the one chosen to become a holy knight - and deliver the brooch to her, and accompany her in her quest to fight evil.=这就是为什么她让我有责任寻找新的救世主——被选为神圣骑士的救世主——并将胸针交给她，陪伴她与邪恶作斗争。
I see... So that's why you came to me...=我懂了。。。这就是你来找我的原因。。。
If I can accomplish my duty, God will continue to protect my village.=如果我能完成我的职责，上帝将继续保护我的村庄。
I want to protect my friends and family from wild animals, monsters...and humans...=我想保护我的朋友和家人不受野生动物和怪物的伤害。。。而人类。。。
Protect them...from humans...? What does that... Oh... The fairies in the freak shows at the capital...=保护他们。。。来自人类。。。？这意味着什么。。。哦首都怪物秀中的妖精们。。。
Tsk... It's not just that...=Tsk。。。不仅仅是。。。
We fairies are small and weak...and not all fairies are good at magic like me.=我们精灵又小又弱。。。并不是所有的妖精都像我一样擅长魔法。
It's only natural for other species to target us for magic and food. It's survival of the fittest, after all...=其他物种为了魔法和食物把我们作为目标是很自然的。毕竟，这是适者生存。。。
I hate them for it...but I understand why humans capture fairies to make a show out of them... But I don't get why humans and demi-humans...=我恨他们。。。但我明白为什么人类会抓住妖精来表演。。。但我不明白为什么人类和半人类。。。
Why do they break our limbs, strip us of our wings, and stab us with tree branches? How can they treat us like toys...?=为什么它们会折断我们的四肢，剥去我们的翅膀，用树枝刺伤我们？他们怎么能像对待玩具一样对待我们。。。？
I don't get it... Do they enjoy doing that? What have we ever done to your kind!?=我不明白。。。他们喜欢这样做吗？我们对你们做过什么！？

Chapter 9    Writhing Sludge=第九章扭动污泥

For years, I've been training in the magical arts to get strong enough to avenge my comrades and get back at the humans who did terrible things to them... But you humans have short lives. If we leave you alone, you'll eventually die, anyway...=多年来，我一直在接受魔法艺术方面的训练，以变得足够强大，为我的同志报仇，并报复那些对他们做了可怕事情的人。。。但你们人类的寿命很短。如果我们不理你，你终究会死的，不管怎样。。。
To tell you the truth, I don't care what happens to humans. They're unjust, filthy creatures. I don't understand why God lends her power to your kind...=说实话，我不在乎人类会发生什么。他们是不公正、肮脏的生物。我不明白为什么上帝会把她的力量借给你们。。。
Still, this is the decision of the God who protects my village. I'll fulfill the duty she assigned me no matter what.=不过，这是保护我村庄的上帝的决定。不管发生什么事，我都要履行她指派给我的职责。
Monsters are another matter, of course, and we fairies are too small and weak to fight. Your kind prays to God as well, so it makes sense that she chose a human to save the world. It doesn't sit right with me personally, though...=当然，怪物是另一回事，而我们精灵太小太弱，无法战斗。你们也向上帝祈祷，所以她选择了一个人来拯救世界是有道理的。不过，我个人并不这么认为。。。
That's the reason I'm helping your kind.=这就是我帮助你们的原因。
I see...=我懂了。。。
I know that you're not the same as the humans who attacked my comrades... You must be a virtuous and pure person. Still, if you're going to fulfill your destiny as a holy knight, I need you to become stronger.=我知道你和袭击我同志的人不一样。。。你必须是一个善良纯洁的人。不过，如果你想完成你作为神圣骑士的使命，我需要你变得更强大。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Pure...huh...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>纯净的嗯……）
Judging by the way you speak, you must have grown up without struggle or hardship. You mentioned your parents are dead, so is it because of that female?=从你说话的方式来看，你一定是在没有挣扎或艰辛的环境下长大的。你说你父母死了，是因为那个女人吗？
Don't call her that... It's true that Miria took care of me, but I've had struggles in my life, too...=别这么叫她。。。没错，米丽亚照顾过我，但我的生活中也有挣扎。。。
Like...?=喜欢
Well... Um... I had to walk on dangerous mountain paths and risk tripping, and tending the general store can get boring... And I'm poor, so I only get hand-me-down clothes, and Miria wouldn't make tomato soup like I asked her to...=好嗯。。。我不得不走在危险的山路上，冒着被绊倒的风险，照看杂货店可能会变得无聊。。。我很穷，所以我只买旧衣服，而米莉亚不会像我要求的那样做番茄汤。。。
Stop. I've heard enough. *Sigh* Looks like I have to be even stricter with you. Good grief, why did God have to pick you?=停止我听够了*唉，看来我得对你更严格了。天哪，为什么上帝要选你？
You always run blindly ahead without listening to me. That's how you got stuck with that curse... You can't even appreciate the cooking I do for you...=你总是盲目地向前跑，不听我的话。这就是你被诅咒的原因。。。你甚至不能感激我为你做的菜。。。
I get that you're not used to fighting, but I still see hesitation in your sword swings. And yet, when I try to help you practice, you immediately get tired...=我知道你不习惯打架，但我仍然能看到你挥剑时的犹豫。然而，当我试着帮你练习的时候，你马上就累了。。。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Urk... I just wanted to get along with Iris, but I only made her mad at me... I shouldn't have talked to her...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>乌尔克。。。我只是想和你好好相处Iris, 但我只是让她生我的气。。。我不该和她说话……）
I've taught you how to purify crystals before, but you still can only make simple things, right?=我以前教过你如何净化水晶，但你仍然只能做简单的东西，对吗？
We can go over it again, so try to review what you learned yourself.=我们可以再复习一遍，所以试着复习一下你自己学到的东西。
O-Okay...=好吧。。。

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 11 In the Name of God's Knight?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第11章以上帝骑士的名义?
Quarry=采石场
Iris... U-Um... Is there...a Drain Crystal around here?=Iris... 嗯。。。有。。。A.导能水晶 在这里？
There is. I can sense its wavelength from under this cliff. Let's go.=有。我能从悬崖下感觉到它的波长。走吧。

Even with your holy knight strength, you won't survive a fall from this height. Be careful not to lose your footing on the suspension bridge.=即使你拥有神圣骑士的力量，你也无法从这个高度坠落下来。小心别在吊桥上失足。
What strange bugs... They look like they're carrying rocks.=多么奇怪的虫子。。。他们看起来像在搬石头。
Those are rock eaters. They ingest rocks and use their components to create conglomerates on their backs. That's what they use to attack and defend themselves.=那些是吃石头的。它们吞食岩石并利用其成分在背部形成砾岩。这就是他们用来攻击和保护自己的东西。
They're very strong, so I don't think they'll notice if you hop on their backs.=他们非常强壮，所以我认为如果你跳到他们的背上，他们不会注意到。

I can sense human life. Three wavelengths, to be exact...=我能感觉到人类的生活。确切地说，三个波长。。。

No... We don't have to go to them... They're coming to us...=不我们不必去找他们。。。他们要来找我们。。。

But when I look back at it now, I don't know why it bothered me so much. When I turned into a monster, I realized that all I ever wanted was to see you become happy with a nice family of your own...=但是，当我现在回头看时，我不知道为什么这么困扰着我。\n当我变成一个怪物时，我意识到我所想要的只是看到你对自己的一个漂亮的家庭感到满意......
Oh, I won't allow a family with a human man, though! Heehee... Don't worry, I'll pick out a bunch of wonderful monster grooms suitable for my lovely sister!=哦，我不会允许一个人与人类的家人！ heehee ......别担心，我会挑出一堆精彩的怪物新郎适合我可爱的妹妹！

You and I both have blue eyes and chestnut-colored hair tied into braids. We even have matching blue ribbons. The village people would always tell us how similar we looked...=你和我都有蓝眼睛和栗色的头发绑成辫子。\n我们甚至有匹配的蓝丝带。\n村里总是告诉我们我们看起来的相似......
And the necklace with this red gem... The goblins saw me with it and liberated me from my ties to humanity. This was your gift to me... It made me so happy...=和这个红色的宝石的项链......那只哥布林看到了我，从我的关系中解放了我。\n这是你给我的礼物......它让我如此开心......

We fairies live a lot longer than humans, so we have a lot more life experience. If God was picky about purity like you think she is, there wouldn't be anyone qualified to serve her!=我们妖精的生活比人类更长，所以我们有更多的生活经历。\n如果上帝挑剔纯洁，就像你认为她一样，没有任何人有资格为她服务！

Chapter 14    The Witch and the Village Girl=第1章4女巫和乡村
Going back in time, to a day before Claret's house was attacked by Orcs...=回到过去，到克萨尔的房子被兽人袭击之前的一天......
What!? You've read all the books in here, Claret!?=什么！？\n你在这里阅读了所有书，克罗尔！？
Yes, most of them. You're welcome to read whatever tickles your fancy!=是的，大多数人。\n欢迎您阅读您的花哨的速度！
I can? Then...don't mind if I do...=我能？\n然后......不要介意我是否这样做......
Wow, this book... The text is so dense, and it's filled with strange patterns... I don't think I can read these characters...=哇，这本书......文字是如此密集，它充满了奇怪的模式......我不认为我能读取这些角色......
The books around there are my father's collection of healing spells. Piled over here are my mother's combat magic books.=周围的书籍有我父亲的愈合法术。\n堆在这里是我母亲的战斗魔法书籍。
Wow... That's amazing... I fall asleep reading books if they aren't filled with pictures. I can't read anything too difficult, either...=哇......这真是太棒了......如果没有填满图片，我就会睡着了阅读书籍。\n我无法阅读任何太难，要么......
I like stuff like encyclopedias on animals and plants.=我喜欢像动物和植物上的百科全书这样的东西。
I think most people are like that. I only read these because I'm a mage living in the middle of nowhere. I have nothing else to do when I'm bored.=我想大多数人都是这样的。\n我只读这些，因为我是一个生活在茫茫荒野的法师。\n当我无聊时，我没有别的事情要做。
So that's how you got so smart... Even though you're younger than me...=所以这就是你那么聪明的方式......即使你比我年轻......
Heehee! I bet I know more about magic than the mages in the royal capital! I know a lot of things you don't, too, Ricca!=嘻嘻！\n我打赌我更了解魔法比皇家资本的法师更了解！\n我也知道你不做的事情，也是你的话！
Hmm... Is that so...=嗯......那是......
Then...do you know about succubus crystals...?=然后......你知道魔术晶体吗？
Succubus crystals...? That's a common name for a kind of light-red gem. What about them?=魅魔水晶......？\n这是一种浅红色宝石的常见名称。\n他们呢？
One time...I gave one to someone as a present. Oh, I didn't buy it for them, though. I gave what I received from someone else as a gift...=一次......我给了一个人作为礼物。\n哦，我没有为他们买它。\n我给了我从别人那里收到的礼物......
I was just wondering if that person who gave it to me knew what it was... He said that a mage that visited the village dropped it off, but... I wonder if he knew...about the color... You know?=我只是想知道那个把它给我的人知道它是什么......他说一个参观村里的法师把它放下了，但是......我想知道他是否知道......关于颜色......\n你懂的？
"You know"...? About what? You're still talking about that rock that's made out of powdered life crystal and magic stone, right?=“你懂的”...？\n关于什么？\n你还在谈论那块岩石，它是用粉状的生活水晶和魔法石做出的吗？
By the way, the light-red color comes from the mixture of pink life crystal and deep-red magic stone.=顺便说一下，浅红色来自粉红色的寿命和深红色魔石的混合物。
I see... But that isn't what I was asking about. I heard that the crystal's color represents a girl's...=我明白了......但这不是我问的。\n我听说水晶的颜色代表一个女孩......
A-Actually, never mind. Heehee... I think they're pretty, but I guess they're not that popular, huh?=实际上，没关系。 heehee ......我认为他们很漂亮，但我想他们不是那么受欢迎，呵呵？
Umm...? I suppose due to their lack of clarity, they aren't often worn as gemstones.=嗯......？\n我想由于他们缺乏清晰度，他们通常不作为宝石磨损。
They're not completely worthless, though. Because refining magic stones can be difficult, and they can be used as little good-luck charms, they're relatively expensive. They're good substitutes for carrying around money.=但是，他们并不完全毫无价值。\n因为精炼魔术石块可能很困难，所以它们可以用作少许好运的魅力，它们相对昂贵。\n他们是携带金钱的好替代品。
Yes, indeed.=确实是的。
I also know that some regions think the succubus crystal signifies the color of a woman's genitalia. They're typically just called pink crystals around here, though...=我也知道一些地区认为魔术水晶表示女人的生殖器的颜色。\n他们通常只是在这里叫粉红色晶体，但是......
G-Genitalia...!? Umm... Does that mean... H-Hey... So you did know, Claret!?=G-Genitalia ......！？\n嗯......这是否意味着...... H-嘿......所以你已经知道了，克萨尔！？
Heehee, you were trying to get me flustered, weren't you? Hehe! Too bad it didn't work!=Heehee，你试图让我变得慌乱，不是吗？\n呵呵！\n太糟糕了，它不起作用！
I may be younger than you, but I'm pretty knowledgeable!=我可能比你年轻，但我非常了解！
U-Urk... I see...=你看到...
(<indent%3D0.4em>I thought Iris taught me a lot of stuff, but... I guess I'm no match for her when it comes to knowledge about magic...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我以为♥教我很多东西，但是......我想我觉得魔术知识时对她没有匹配......）
Yup! Heehee! Would you like me to teach you what I know?=对！\n嘻嘻！\n你想让我教你我所知道的吗？
(<indent%3D0.4em>Whoa, Claret's eyes are glittering... She must love teaching people. She's been letting me stay at her place for a while now, so I don't want to hurt her feelings...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>哇，克萨尔的眼睛是闪闪发光的......她必须喜欢教人。\n她一直让我留在她的地方，所以我不想伤害她的感情......）
S-Sure... Maybe you could teach me a little...=肯定......也许你可以教我一点......
Alrighty, then! I'm a little surprised by how childish you can be, though, Ricca. Did you really think you could embarrass me with that little tidbit?=好吧，然后！\n我有点惊讶你可以幼稚，Ricca。\n你真的认为你能用那个小的潮汐难堪吗？
Am I that childish...? I-I mean, I know a lot of things too, like...this and that...<size%3D50%>I have...experience too... Even if it was forced... Ugh *Sob*...</size>」=我是那个幼稚......？\n我 - 我的意思是，我也知道很多东西，就像......这个......<size%3D50%>我有......体验......即使它被迫......呃*呜咽* ...</size>」
You do? Heehee! Oh, I know... If you're going to travel back to your village, I'll teach you how to make rare crystals. They'll come in handy for your trip.=你做？\n嘻嘻！\n哦，我知道......如果你打算回到你的村庄，我会教你如何制作稀有水晶。\n他们会派上你的旅行。

But where did that castle come from? It just appeared out of nowhere. Shouldn't he have continued his plans in secret...?=但那座城堡是从哪里来的？它不知从哪里冒出来。他不应该秘密地继续他的计划吗...？
We've been going around destroying Drain Crystals, so he wasn't able to maintain the magic to hide the castle. Either that, or...=我们一直在四处破坏导能水晶s、 所以他无法维持隐藏城堡的魔法。要么那样，要么...

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 19 The Lord of Statues (Part 1)?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 1.章9雕像之王（上）?
Island of the Ancient Castle=古堡之岛
So that's...the monsters' castle...=那就是...怪物城堡...
I flew up and took a look, but this whole place is squirming with the powerful magic energy of monsters... Ugh... Ack... It's making my chest tighten... I was away from you for too long...=我飞上去看了一眼，但整个地方都被怪物强大的魔法能量扭曲着...呃...确认...这让我的胸口绷紧...我离开你太久了...
Iris, what's wrong? You don't look very good.=Iris, 怎么了？你看起来不太好。
Ugh... The monsters' magic was overwhelming me. Fairies are sensitive to changes in magic energy...=呃...怪物的魔力让我无法抵抗。精灵对魔法能量的变化很敏感...
I'm fine... It'll eventually get better...if I stay near you and your waves of holy energy.=我很好...最终会好起来的...如果我靠近你和你神圣能量的波浪。
Really? Wouldn't you feel better if you stayed inside me?=真正地如果你待在我体内，你不会感觉更好吗？
I would, but I want to be aware of the monsters who lurk around us, so I need to stay outside as much as possible...=我会的，但我想知道潜伏在我们周围的怪物，所以我需要尽可能多地待在外面...
I see... Don't push yourself. If it gets too hard, you can come inside me whenever you like.=我懂了...不要强迫自己。如果太难了，你可以随时来找我。
Hehe... Thank you. But you better not say that to anyone else. Especially men...=呵呵...非常感谢。但你最好不要对别人说。尤其是男人...
Huh? Okay...? Wait... Iris, what are you implying!?=嗯？可以等待Iris, 你在暗示什么！？
I'm joking! Heehee... Although, you probably should be a little more sexually aware.=我在开玩笑！嘿嘿...不过，你可能应该有一点性意识。
...Mind your own business.=...管好你自己的事。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Iris... She used to say she doesn't like joking around... She kinda reminds me...of my friend Olivia who married a man from the royal capital...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>Iris... 她过去常说她不喜欢开玩笑...她让我想起了...我朋友的Olivia 他娶了一个来自皇家首都的男人……）
It's the top of the tower... That's where the powerful evil magic is coming from. Archlich is probably there...!=这是塔顶...这就是强大的邪恶魔法的来源。阿奇Ricca可能在那里...！
It's so hot... It must be all the steam released from the ground... It's just like Dragon's Valley...=太热了...一定是地下释放的蒸汽...就像龙谷一样...
But unlike that valley, this place is blowing out heated seawater. Looks like we won't get to take a dip in a hot spring this time.=但和那个山谷不同的是，这个地方正在喷出加热的海水。看来这次我们不能泡温泉了。
Ack...! A river...of flames...!?=啊...！一条河...火焰...！？
Molten rock is flowing along...=熔岩在流动...
Be careful. If you fall into that river of flame, even divine protection won't save you from the lava.=小心。如果你掉进火焰之河，即使是神圣的保护也无法将你从熔岩中拯救出来。
Okay, I'll watch where I step...!=好的，我会看着我的脚步...！
So many stone statues... They look like soldiers... Wait, are they...!?=这么多石像...他们看起来像士兵...等等，他们是...！？
The mage did mention something like this... That there was a monster that turns people to stone on this island...=魔法师确实提到过这样的事情...岛上有个怪物把人变成石头...
Hey, Iris... Is there a way we can turn these people back to normal?=嘿Iris... 有没有办法让这些人恢复正常？
If they were alive when they were petrified, killing the monster that cursed them should undo the spell...but I didn't see any gazers on our way here.=如果他们在被石化时还活着，杀死诅咒他们的怪物应该会解除咒语...但我在来这里的路上没有看到任何人。
The petrification monster... I wonder where it is...=石化怪物...我想知道它在哪里...
This bridge should lead us to the castle.=这座桥应该能把我们引向城堡。
I'm still wondering where the petrification monster is...but I guess we have to move forward.=我还在想石化怪物在哪里...但我想我们必须前进。
A silver golem...?=一个银色的傀儡...？
Did that golem turn the soldiers into stone...?=那个傀儡把士兵变成石头了吗...？
I've never heard of anyone making a golem with that kind of power...=我从没听说过有人用这种力量制造傀儡...
What a surprise. It attacked us... I suppose it's the gatekeeper of this castle.=真是个惊喜。它袭击了我们...我猜是这座城堡的看门人吧。
Unlike the golem we fought before, this one is made of metal... Its body is going to repel your weapon if you slash at it.=与我们之前战斗过的傀儡不同，这个傀儡是由金属制成的...如果你猛击它，它的身体会击退你的武器。
But you've come this far. That golem is no match for you now!=但你已经走了这么远。那个傀儡现在不是你的对手！
Yeah! I'll show it how strong I've become!=是 啊我要让它知道我有多坚强！
The gate to the castle is closed... Maybe I can climb up the wall by throwing my sword into it... Hmm... But I think I'll run out of magic before I can climb to the top...=城堡的大门关闭了...也许我可以把剑扔进墙里爬上去...嗯... 但我想在我爬到山顶之前我的魔法就会耗尽...
You've gotten pretty strong, but even your powers aren't enough to pry this sturdy door open... What do we do...?=你变得很强壮，但即使你的力量也不足以撬开这扇坚固的门...我们该怎么办...？
Oh, I know! Let's have the golem we just defeated on the bridge destroy this door!=哦，我知道！让我们在桥上击败的傀儡摧毁这扇门！
What are we going to do with it? I also think its big arms are strong enough to break it open...but we shattered the red gem on its chest. It won't move anymore.=我们该怎么办？我还认为它的大胳膊足够强壮，可以把它打开...但我们打碎了它胸前的红色宝石。它不会再动了。
Heehee, I came up with the perfect idea. No wonder I'm the best magic user in my village...!=嘿嘿，我想出了一个完美的主意。难怪我是村里最好的魔法使用者...！
I'll get it ready, so could you go defeat about three monsters and collect their Magic Stones?=我会准备好的，所以你能打败三个怪物并收集他们的魔法石吗？
Sure, but...I don't have a good feeling about this... You were like this when we started magic training, too...=当然，但是...我感觉不太好...我们开始魔法训练时你也是这样...
Phew... Alright, I got the Magic Stones!=呸...好了，我拿到魔法石了！
That was fast.=太快了。
Of course. We have to get to Archlich as soon as we can...and you said that the monsters' wavelengths make you feel sick when you're away from me, so I collected them in a hurry.=当然我们必须尽快赶到阿奇Ricca...你说当你离开我的时候，怪物的波长会让你感到恶心，所以我很快收集了它们。
Thanks, I appreciate you hurrying. Could you place the Magic Stones on top of the magic circle, then stand in the center of the circle?=谢谢，谢谢你赶时间。你能把魔法石放在魔法圈的顶端，然后站在魔法圈的中心吗？
Sure, but...what are you going to do?=当然，但是...你打算怎么办？
We're going to make a new core for the golem, and we're going to transfer your spirit into the controls.=我们将为傀儡制造一个新的核心，我们将把你的灵魂转移到控制中。
Huh... Wait, my spirit...!? You don't mean I'm going to end up as the golem...do you!?=呵呵...等等，我的灵魂...！？你不是说我最终会成为傀儡...你…吗！？

N-No! That sounds too dangerous! I changed my mind. Let me try throwing my sword at the wall. I think I can climb it!=不！听起来太危险了！我改变了主意。让我试试把剑扔到墙上。我想我能爬上去！
I doubt you can. Besides, even if you were able to climb the wall, you would be depleted of magic. How would you fight the monsters that are no doubt lurking beyond the gate then?=我怀疑你能。此外，即使你能爬上长城，你的魔法也会耗尽。那么，你将如何与潜伏在大门外的怪物战斗呢？
If you want to stop Archlich as soon as possible, just do what I say, alright?=如果你想尽快阻止阿奇Ricca，就照我说的做，好吗？
If a monster can make a golem core... Heehee, it should be easy as pie for me! I'm the best among my fairy friends, after all...=如果一个怪物能制造一个傀儡核心...嘿嘿，对我来说应该很容易！毕竟，我是我的妖精朋友中最好的...
It's my first time doing this, but I'm sure it'll go well.=这是我第一次这么做，但我相信会顺利进行的。
"First time"? "I bet"? That only makes me more nervous... I won't end up as a golem forever, will I...?=“第一次”？“我打赌”？这只会让我更紧张...我不会永远成为一个傀儡，对吗...？
Don't worry. Your spirit is linked to the holy knight's brooch, so when the core crystal breaks, you'll automatically return to your own body.=别担心。你的精神与圣骑士'当核心水晶破裂时，你会自动回到你自己的身体。
Are you sure...? Ugh... Okay...=你确定...？呃...可以

Yup. Your spirit is in the golem now, so it's more accurate to call that your shell.=是的。你的灵魂现在在傀儡中，所以更准确地说是你的壳。
Don't talk about my body like that... I wish I'd fallen on some grass and not a dirty patch of ground like that...=不要那样谈论我的身体...我希望我掉在草地上，而不是那样一片肮脏的土地上...
We don't have much time, alright? I made you a ribbon out of the leftover Magic Stones, so cheer up.=我们时间不多了，好吗？我用剩下的魔法石给你做了一条丝带，所以振作起来。
Wow, it matches the blue ribbon I always wear! Wait...this ribbon looks hard. It's not cute at all...=哇，它和我一直戴的蓝丝带很相配！等待这条丝带看起来很硬。一点都不可爱...

You're absolutely sure I'll return to my body, right?=你绝对确定我会回到我的身体，对吗？
Huh? What are you looking around for?=嗯？你在找什么？
This feeling... Monsters are gathering around us. Looks like we took too long. We better destroy that gate soon.=这种感觉...怪物正在我们周围聚集。看来我们花的时间太长了。我们最好尽快摧毁那扇门。
O-Okay...but...I can't leave my body laying down there! The monsters might do things to it...!=好吧...但是我不能让我的身体躺在那里！怪物可能会对它做些什么...！
Don't worry, I'll watch over it. Now hurry and destroy the castle gate before any powerful monsters get here. After you take down the gate, you can break the core yourself and return to your body.=我不会担心的。现在赶快在任何强大的怪物到来之前摧毁城堡之门。取下闸门后，你可以自己打破核心，回到身体。
Ugh, okay... I'll go destroy the gate.=好吧...我去摧毁大门。
Good. You should be able to beat any monsters that come at your way with that body.=好的你应该能够打败任何带着那具尸体向你走来的怪物。

Iris, did you say that there are monsters near my body!? I'm coming back! I just have to break the gem on my chest, right!?=Iris, 你是说我的身体附近有怪物吗！？我要回来了！我只需要把胸前的宝石打碎，对吧！？
Don't worry, I can handle these monsters and buy you some time. You focus on destroying the gate as soon as possible!=别担心，我能对付这些怪物，给你争取时间。你要集中精力尽快摧毁大门！
Ugh... I may have used too much power making the golem core. I only have about half of my magic energy left... I need to make it last until the gate is broken!=呃...我可能在制作傀儡核心时使用了太多的能量。我只剩下一半的魔法能量了...我要让它一直持续到大门被打破！

That's right! I strengthened the core, so you need to use something hard to crack it!=这是正确的！我加强了核心，所以你需要用一些难破解的东西！
I've strengthened the core crystal with magic, so it shouldn't break under those monsters' attacks. Still, you'll flinch if you take too much damage, so keep your guard up.=我用魔法强化了核心水晶，所以它不会在那些怪物的攻击下破裂。尽管如此，如果你受到太多的伤害，你还是会退缩，所以要保持警惕。

I'll be fine!=我会没事的！
That's good to hear. Please be careful.=很高兴听到你这么说。请小心。
You're the ones who should be careful. I found a lot of petrified soldiers, so watch out for any dangerous monsters lurking around when you get to the island.=你才是应该小心的人。我发现了很多石化的士兵，所以当你到达岛上时，要小心周围潜伏的危险怪物。

The curse on my tummy tingles a little... What are the magic circles around here for?=我肚子上的诅咒有点刺痛...这里的魔法圈是干什么的？
They're teleportation circles... They're transferring magic from here to the room behind this door.=他们是传送圈...他们正在把魔法从这里转移到门后的房间。
The towers collect the magic sent from the Drain Crystals scattered across the land and then transfer the magic here.=塔楼收集了来自太阳的魔法导能水晶然后把魔法转移到这里。

It would, but the teleportation circles themselves are maintained from the end sending the magic. If we want to destroy them, we have to do it from the other side.=是的，但是传送圈本身从传送魔法的最后一刻起就一直保持着。如果我们想摧毁他们，我们必须从另一边去做。

The tentacles had raped every hole in body, making them all cum at least a hundred times each, and my magic had been sucked dry.=这些触手强奸了身体上的每一个洞，使它们都至少有一百个次 每一次，我的魔法都被吸干了。
My magic, my body and my mind were completely drained. I was only barely alive because of the holy energy from the brooch.=我的魔法、我的身体和我的思想都被完全耗尽了。因为胸针的神圣能量，我才勉强活着。
But the brooch is a magical item that uses the magic of its wearer to extract holy energy from the earth and the air.=但胸针是一种神奇的物品，它利用佩戴者的魔法从地球和空气中提取神圣能量。
If it runs out of fuel to gather that holy energy, then...=如果收集神圣能量的燃料耗尽，那么...
*Click*... *Clang*, *clang*...=*点击**叮当声*，*叮当声*...
The brooch slips from my chest, blinking weakly and rolling across the urine and tentacle-covered floor.=胸针从我胸口滑落，微弱地眨着眼睛，在尿液和触手覆盖的地板上滚动。
*Clang*, *clang*...* *Clang...*=*叮当声*，*叮当声*…**叮当声*
It stops rolling, landing silently in the middle of the puddle.=它停止滚动，静静地在水坑中间着陆。
*Crack*=*裂开*
Cracks run through the red jewel, reflecting light from the ceiling all around the room.=红宝石上布满了裂缝，反射着房间四周天花板上的光线。

*Shatter...*=*粉碎*
The holy knight's brooch must have exhausted its power in order to keep me alive.=这个圣骑士'我的胸针一定是用尽了它的力量才让我活着。
The jewel, made from the life force of fairies, cracks, its remaining dim light fading.=这颗由妖精的生命力制成的宝石裂开了，剩下的微光逐渐消失。
Ah...=啊...

A long time ago... The woman who gave me the reason to seek out eternal life... The unfaithful whore who toyed with me then betrayed me back when I was the court wizard...=很久以前...那个给我寻找永生的理由的女人...那个玩弄我的不忠妓女在我当宫廷巫师的时候背叛了我...
The queen of this castle escaped my grasp and fled to your village. Along with her bodyguard, the knight that was the previous owner of my body...=这座城堡的女王逃脱了我的控制，逃到了你的村庄。还有她的保镖，我身体的前主人骑士...

I believed that for someone to complete this mission without abusing my power, they would have to be someone who cares for all living things - big or small - and have the strength to fight for the people important to them.=我相信，要想在不滥用我权力的情况下完成这项任务，他们必须是一个关心所有生物的人——无论大小——并且有力量为对他们来说重要的人而战。

I feel bad for roping you into this in the first place... I don't want you to suffer anymore...=我一开始就为把你牵扯进来感到难过...我不想让你再受苦了...
Ricca, you've fought enough. You can live out the rest of your life happily here, as everyone's mother... Your big sis here knows that you love doing stuff that feels good.=Ricca, 你已经打够了。作为每个人的母亲，你可以在这里快乐地度过余生...你的大姐姐知道你喜欢做感觉很好的事情。
Feel good all the time...and become everyone's mother...=一直感觉很好...成为每个人的母亲...
Have a happy life...surrounded by a loving family... *Sniff*... I can make...Miria's wish...come true...=有一个幸福的生活...被一个充满爱的家庭包围*嗅嗅*...我可以...Miria'但愿...成真
Ah, aaaah... I... I want to be...with...everyone...=啊，啊...我我想成为...具有每个人
————————————————————————————【3D】第二十二话-Ricaa被打败结束————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————【主线】第二十三话开始——————————————————————————————
Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 23 The Fairy Tale Of Holy Knight Ricca?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 2.章3.童话：圣骑士Ricca?
World of Darkness=黑暗的世界
Mwahahaha!!!=哈哈哈！！！
The time has come... The doorway to the World of Darkness is complete!=时间到了...通往黑暗世界的大门已经完成！
Archlich...!=阿奇Ricca...！
Ugh... So he wasn't dead yet! Fine, let's release the powers of the brooch and...=呃...所以他还没死！好吧，让我们释放胸针的力量，然后...
Foolish slaves of the Goddess... While we were fighting, I completed the doorway to the World of Darkness using the magic I exuded!=愚蠢的女神奴隶...当我们在战斗时，我用我散发出的魔法完成了通往黑暗世界的大门！
What...!? Iris, can't we close the gate ourselves!?=什么Iris, 我们不能自己关上门吗！？
We stopped the supply of magic...but we can only wait for it to close by itself...=我们停止了魔法的供应...但我们只能等待它自行关闭...
Mwahahaha...! I will enter the gate and head to the World of Darkness!=哈哈哈...！我将进入大门，走向黑暗的世界！
I will release the Darkfiend Dragon that is sealed there, and have it consume you all! I will enter the land of God and obtain her body next!=我会释放密封在那里的黑暗之龙，让它吞噬你们所有人！下一步我将进入上帝的土地，获得她的尸体！
Mwahahahaha...! Hahahahahaha...!=哈哈哈...！哈哈哈...！
Iris... I'm going to the World of Darkness. I'll finish off Archlich there once and for all...!=Iris... 我要去黑暗的世界。我会一劳永逸地干掉阿奇Ricca...！
The magic supply to the gate is already cut off, so the gate will eventually close. If you don't defeat Archlich before then, you won't be able to return to this world...=大门的魔法供应已经被切断，所以大门最终会关闭。如果你不在那之前打败阿奇Ricca，你将无法回到这个世界...
But if I can prevent Archlich and the Darkfiend Dragon from coming to this world until it closes, then I can protect everyone, right? Heehee! Let's look on the bright side!=但如果我能阻止阿奇Ricca和黑暗之龙来到这个世界，直到它关闭，那么我就能保护所有人，对吗？嘿嘿！让我们看看好的一面！
You're right... Let's go to the World of Darkness...!=你说得对...让我们去黑暗的世界吧...！
Captain, please take care of my sister and Claret.=队长，请照顾好我妹妹和Claret.
Alright... I'll be sure to take them back to town.=好吧我一定会把他们带回镇上。
Be safe, you two... Please come back to us no matter what...=安全点，你们两个...不管发生什么，请回到我们身边...
Ricca, Miss Fairy... Have a safe trip...!=Ricca, 妖精小姐...祝你一路平安...！
Okay, I'm off...!=好了，我走了...！
Archlich...! This time I'll cut you into pieces so you can never revive...=阿奇Ricca...！这一次我会把你切成碎片，这样你就再也活不起来了...
Huh...? He's not here...?=呵呵...？他不在这里...？
Is this the World of Darkness...? It's a lot prettier than I imagined...=这是黑暗的世界吗...？比我想象的漂亮多了...
That's...=那是...
The Darkfiend Dragon! Thank goodness, the seal hasn't been lifted yet... This whole space is filled with holy energy that's keeping that giant dragon sealed.=黑暗的龙！谢天谢地，封印还没有解除...这整个空间充满了神圣的能量，使巨龙得以密封。
That's the Darkfiend Dragon...? He looks like a huge snake... And there's something fuzzy cutting his head off halfway...=那是黑鬼龙...？他看起来像条大蛇...有个毛茸茸的东西把他的头砍了一半...
That's a giant gate... I sense a different wavelength from it than the gate Archlich opened... Maybe his head is sealed in a separate dimension...=那是一扇巨大的门...我感觉到它的波长与阿奇Ricca打开的门不同...也许他的头被密封在另一个维度里...
Uh... Did you say, "giant gate"...?=UH你是说“巨门”吗...？
Yes, what about it?=是的，怎么样？
If the Darkfiend Dragon is that big, isn't the gate that leads to our world too small...?=如果黑暗的龙那么大，那么通往我们世界的大门不是太小了吗...？
That's true... But we're talking about Archlich. That crafty bastard probably has something up his sleeve.=没错...但我们说的是阿奇Ricca。那个狡猾的混蛋可能有秘密。
Look... There's another gate over there! I can feel Archlich's wavelength from that one...=看那边还有一扇门！我能感觉到Archlich的波长...
Is he beyond that gate...? Let's hurry over!=他在那扇门那边吗...？我们快点过去吧！
It's a little far from the Darkfiend Dragon's gate... I'll fly over there with my new wings.=离黑暗之门有点远...我要用我的新翅膀飞过去。
Using your wings consumes magic. Make sure you let them rest every once in a while by landing on the ground so you can recover energy.=使用你的翅膀消耗魔法。确保每隔一段时间让它们落地休息一次，这样你就能恢复能量。
Okay! Flying is like a dream come true. I used to be jealous of your wings too, you know?=可以飞行就像梦想成真。我以前也嫉妒你的翅膀，你知道吗？
There are monsters nearby... Archlich must have sent them to scout the area.=附近有怪物...阿奇Ricca一定是派他们去侦察区域.
What's this thing stuck in the Darkfiend Dragon's body...? A large magic sword...?=这是什么东西卡在黑鬼龙的身体里...？一把巨大的魔法剑...？
The predecessor holy knight pierced him with that sword as a seal... The Dragon was turned into stone with holy power...=前任圣骑士 用那把剑刺穿了他...龙被变成了具有神圣力量的石头...
The Darkfiend Dragon... What a huge monster... If he was set loose in our world, every town and village would be destroyed!=黑暗的龙...多大的怪物啊...如果他被放在我们的世界里，每个城镇和村庄都会被摧毁！
Absolutely... But luckily the Dragon's still sealed... Let's defeat Archlich as soon as possible!=绝对地但幸运的是龙仍然被封住了...让我们尽快打败阿奇Ricca！
I can feel his magic from the other side of the gate...=我能从大门的另一边感受到他的魔力...
With your current power, it should be easy to defeat that wounded wizard. Let's go!=用你现在的力量，打败那个受伤的巫师应该很容易。走吧！
Okay... Let's go!=可以走吧！
So the scar it sustained in the previous battle is still here...=所以它在上一次战斗中留下的伤疤还在这里...
So you've come, bitch curs...=你来了，贱人...
I'm so glad you accepted my invitation!=很高兴你接受了我的邀请！
Hmph... So that's why you ran away laughing like that...=嗯...所以你笑着跑开了...
That's right, gnat. I tricked you into following me so that I'd be able to kill you for sure.=没错，小虫子。我骗你跟着我这样我就能肯定杀了你。
I have the power of all my allies flowing through my body...! You don't have the strength to defeat us!=我有我所有盟友的力量流过我的身体...！你没有力量打败我们！
Mwahaha... Do you think I tricked you into coming here just to be defeated so easily?!=姆瓦哈...你以为我骗你来这里就是为了这么容易被打败吗？！
This time you don't face just me! It'll be me and the Darkfiend Dragon, together!=这次你不能只面对我！那将是我和黑暗的龙，一起！
Reawaken, Darkfiend Dragon! Tear apart the servants of the God that sealed you away, and use their magic to heal your scars!=醒醒，黑暗的龙！撕裂封住你的上帝的仆人，用他们的魔法来治愈你的伤疤！
Ah...! The magic sword seal...!=啊...！魔法剑印...！
The Darkfiend Dragon...is resurrecting...!? Make it stop, Archlich!=黑暗的龙...正在复活...！？停下来，阿奇Ricca！
This place is going dark... The holy power sealing the Dragon must be weakening...!=这地方变黑了...封龙的神圣力量一定在减弱...！
Mwahahaha! Mwahahaha!!!=哈哈哈！哈哈哈！！！
MWAHAHAHAHAHA!!!=哈哈哈！！！
Oh, no...=哦，不...
Darkfiend Dragon, my loyal minion...=黑暗之龙，我忠诚的仆从...
Kill the holy knight who sealed me away!!!=杀死圣骑士 谁把我关起来了！！！
AGYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!=啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！
The Darkfiend Dragon...swallowed Archlich...!?=黑暗的龙...吞下阿奇Ricca...！？
Archlich had the body of the holy knight who sealed the Darkfiend Dragon, so it's only natural that the Dragon attacked him first... Hah, serves him right!=阿奇Ricca拥有那具尸体圣骑士 谁封住了黑暗的龙，所以龙先攻击他是很自然的...哈，他活该！
Looks like Archlich wasn't enough to fill his stomach... We're his next prey.=看来Archlich还不够填饱肚子...我们是他的下一个猎物。
If this monster...were to get through the gate and come to our world...=如果这个怪物...穿过大门来到我们的世界...
If the old holy knight was able to defeat him...then I can beat him with the power I've gained, too...!=如果老圣骑士 能够打败他...然后我也可以用我获得的力量打败他...！
The magic sword drawn out of the Darkfiend Dragon's body... We might be able to use that to stop him!=从黑龙身上拔出的魔法剑...我们也许可以用它来阻止他！
I got it! Iris, lend me your strength!=我得到了它！Iris, 借我力量！
Of course...! This is our final battle!=当然这是我们的最后一战！
Upon grapple defeat by Darkfiend Dragon\r\n"Ricca's insect birth" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被黑暗之龙击败后\n"Ricca'“昆虫的诞生”\nH场景（已经看过）
The magic sealing sword is pierced into the ground... If I send my magic into it, I might be able to stop his movements!=神奇的封印剑被刺穿在地上...如果我施展魔法，我也许能阻止他的动作！
Iris!=Iris!
Right! Legendary holy knight... Please lend us your strength!=正当非常著名的圣骑士... 请给我们力量！
Aaaaaah!=啊啊！
Nngh... Nghaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!=嗯...哈哈哈哈！
The Darkfiend Dragon fell! Now's your chance to beat him!=黑暗的龙倒下了！现在是你打败他的机会！
The Darkfiend Dragon's not just big, he's super resilient...=暗黑龙不仅个头大，而且非常有韧性...
But your attacks are definitely working! Keep on fighting!=但是你的攻击确实有效！继续战斗！
Weight : 58.5kg <color%3D#7F7F7F>(-0.62)</color>=体重 : 58.5公斤 <color%3D#7F7F7F>(-0.62)</color>
His tail... It can even do that!?=他的尾巴...它甚至可以做到！？
He still hasn't collapsed!? This is getting annoying!=他还没倒下！？这太烦人了！
So close...! You're almost there! You can do it!=太近了...！你快到了！你能行！
It looks like it's working, but... Nnngh... The magic energy...everyone gave me is...=看起来很有效，但是...嗯...神奇的能量...每个人给我的都是...
Look out...! Blood...? He must be in real pain now!=留神血他现在一定很痛苦！
One more blow... Can you pull through?=再来一拳...你能撑过去吗？
I'll stab that magic sword in him right at the moment he flinches!=就在他退缩的那一刻，我要把那把魔剑刺进他体内！
Now's your chance, Iris!=现在是你的机会，Iris!
You got it...!=你明白了...！
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaagh!=哈哈哈哈！
He stopped moving... Did he...die...?=他不动了...他有没有...死亡
Phew... Looks like it.=呸...看起来是这样。
Finally... The sword's stuck in his wound... It looks painful...=最后剑卡在他的伤口里...看起来很痛苦...
I wonder if this dragon was manipulated by Archlich back when he fought the holy knight in the fairy tale...=我想知道这条龙是不是在阿奇Ricca与敌人作战时被他操纵的圣骑士 在童话里...
If he was...I'm sorry I had to do that to you...=如果他是...很抱歉我不得不这么对你...
That damn Dragon scared me, though. The way it swooped down from the sky like that.=那条该死的龙吓到我了。像那样从空中俯冲下来。
It must have tremendous magic energy if it could open a gate on its own. Archlich was probably planning to come back to our world with the Dragon using that power.=如果它能自己打开一扇门，它一定有巨大的魔法能量。Archlich可能正计划用龙的力量回到我们的世界。
Come along, now. No use staying here any longer. The gate's magic is weakening, so we need to go through it before it closes.=快点。再呆在这里也没用了。大门的魔力正在减弱，所以我们需要在它关闭之前穿过它。
Mission : Return to your original world=使命：回到你原来的世界
Huh...? Where's the gate that leads to our world!? Did it close already...!?=呵呵...？通往我们世界的大门在哪里！？已经关门了吗...！？

I can sense light from far away... The gate must've been kicked away when the Darkfiend Dragon woke up. Let's hurry!=我能感觉到远处的光...黑暗的龙醒来时，门一定被踢开了。我们快点！
Okay! We'll rush at it headlong!=可以我们要迎头冲过去！
A magic circle...? What is this magic I'm sensing...?=一个神奇的圆圈...？我感觉到的魔法是什么...？
The Darkfiend Dragon!? D-Didn't we defeat him!?=黑暗的龙！？我们不是打败他了吗！？
The Darkfiend Dragon's still alive... Ugh, where's the magic sealing sword...?=黑暗的龙还活着...呃，那把神奇的封剑呢...？
We don't have time to look for it. Watch out, or you'll get eaten.=我们没有时间去寻找它。小心，否则你会被吃掉的。
B-But, if we don't defeat him here, he might follow us to our world...=但是，如果我们不在这里打败他，他可能会跟着我们来到我们的世界...
I have an idea. Just hurry over to the gate!=我有个主意。快到门口去！
I can see the gate now...=我现在可以看到大门了...
Iris, what are we going to do?=Iris, 我们该怎么办？
Right before we go through the gate, I'm going to restore magic to the brooch and create a sealing sword out of it!=在我们穿过大门之前，我要恢复胸针的魔力，并用它创造出一把密封的剑！
With the brooch left by your friends...? Okay, let's do that!=用你朋友留下的胸针...？好吧，我们开始吧！
You're running out of holy knight power, so your transformation will undo itself as you pass through the gate. Be prepared to come out with a few scratches and maybe a broken bone or two.=你的钱快用完了圣骑士 就像你的力量通过这扇门一样。做好准备，露出几处划痕，可能还有一两处骨折。
Sure, I can handle... Wait, "broken bone"!?=当然，我能处理...等等，“断骨”！？
Hehe, don't worry. The mage will heal you with her magic, so you won't die.=呵呵，别担心。法师会用她的魔法治愈你，所以你不会死。
Huff, huff... Almost there...!=哈夫，哈夫...快到了...！
Ricca, I hope you live happily with the people most important to you.=Ricca, 我希望你和对你最重要的人幸福地生活在一起。
I'm taking the brooch off! Protect your head when you go through the gate!=我要把胸针取下来！当你通过大门时，保护好你的头！
Ricca...!=Ricca...!
Ugh... Ngha...=呃...Ngha...
Nngh... Urk... Nnn...=嗯...呜... Nnn...
Ah, Ricca...!=啊，Ricca...!
*Sniff* Ricca!=*嗅嗅*Ricca!
Miria... Claret...=Miria... Claret...
*Sniff* I'm so glad... Since you came back, it must mean you defeated Archlich...!=*嗅嗅，我很高兴...既然你回来了，那一定意味着你打败了阿奇Ricca...！
I'm...back to my normal self...=我是回到我正常的自我...
Right... Iris took the brooch off of me to use it to seal the Darkfiend Dragon...=正当Iris 从我身上取下胸针，用它来封住黑暗的龙...
Wait... Huh...? Where's Iris...?=等待呵呵...？她在哪里Iris...?
Iris...? Are you talking about that little fairy...? I don't see her...=Iris...? 你是说那个小妖精吗...？我没看见她...
I didn't see her come out of the gate...so I assumed she was inside you like she usually is...=我没看见她走出大门...所以我以为她像往常一样在你体内...
Inside me...?=我内心...？
Iris... Iris...!=Iris... Iris...!
Is she still at the other side of the gate...!?=她还在大门的另一边吗...！？
But the gate is...=但大门是...
Ah...! No, wait...!=啊...！不，等等...！
No... Did she really...? To let me escape...?=其.. 她真的...？让我逃走...？
But...you were important to me too, Iris...=但是你对我也很重要，Iris...
She went...and ran ahead of me again...=她去了...然后又跑在我前面...
No... Heehee... I let her do that this time...=其.. 嘿嘿...这次我让她这么做了...
Back when we'd only just met...I got angry every time she talked about her sister... I didn't think well of her for valuing something above her duty as a holy knight...=我们刚见面的时候...每次她说起她妹妹我都很生气...我对她不太好，因为她把一些超出她职责范围的东西作为一个整体来看待圣骑士...
No... Maybe it was envy... Since the day I lost him, I was no longer a "big sister"... To think I was jealous of a human... Heehee...=其.. 也许是嫉妒...自从我失去他的那天起，我就不再是一个“大姐”...想到我嫉妒一个人...嘿嘿...
She was a lot more troublesome than my brother, but...I hope I was able to be a good sister to her...=她比我哥哥麻烦多了，但是...我希望我能成为她的好姐妹...
You're still going to chase me even if it opens your wounds, huh? Well, I suppose I understand... You were sealed here by the holy knight, and then another one comes back to wake you up and fight you again...=即使你的伤口裂开了，你还是要追我，是吗？我想我明白了...你被封在这里圣骑士, 然后另一个回来叫醒你，再次和你战斗...
If what she said was true, I guess you deserve some pity, too.=如果她说的是真的，我想你也应该得到一些同情。
Sure, rest here together. It's the least I can do for my cute little sister...=当然，一起休息吧。这是我能为我可爱的妹妹做的最起码的事...

まけかむ\r\nPoro\r\n融けない氷\r\n君嶋フェリシア\r\nもるもっと\r\nちくわ大明神\r\nAmoracchius\r\novob\r\nDazedFury\r\nまっく\r\nぜくらくら\r\nFlandre Scarlet\r\n中ノ瀬麻子\r\nひまや六々\r\n漆黒@海風\r\nさんこうちょー\r\nNo_action\r\n隣りの魔法使い\r\nHIROYUKI T\r\nHDRAGONH(巴特猎团)\r\nるえろるあ\r\nLindm\r\n8月の夜空、幸運の星。\r\nゲーム大好き\r\n月観酒\r\nふろーか\r\nバカ犬\r\nフェリックス\r\n閃光のハナテ\r\nサイトウ専務\r\nj81654\r\nXETAYA\r\nぼっちアキバ\r\nりよさん\r\n日本海郡\r\nSSE\r\nDDtP\r\n桃天\r\n黒耀石純度98%\r\n佐莉奈\r\n解脱老人卍\r\nヘレニウム\r\nのたー\r\nCaloid Chang\r\nナバン\r\nForunoru\r\nカーン\r\n天禍夜刀神\r\nEllen Maia\r\nトークン\r\nXacky\r\nfel\r\n長瀬UFO | CookRobidence\r\nすえぞーちゃんねる\r\n月次\r\n宵暗微光\r\nNekompetenta\r\n対称なる混沌\r\nSteakNatural\r\n星屑のアルカ\r\naroma squash\r\nウコッケイ\r\nResonaK\r\nけべなひもす\r\nウシロミ\r\nしえな\r\nnanasi01\r\nD.A.SPAWN=まけかむ\n波罗\n融けない氷\n君嶋フェリシア\nもるもっと\nちくわ大明神\n阿莫拉基乌斯\n奥沃布\n茫然的愤怒\nまっく\nぜくらくら\n芙兰朵露·斯卡雷特\n中ノ瀬麻子\nひまや六々\n漆黒@海風\nさんこうちょー\n不采取行动\n隣りの魔法使い\n广幸\n赫德拉贡(巴特猎团)\nるえろるあ\n林德姆\n8.月の夜空、幸運の星。\nゲーム大好き\n月観酒\nふろーか\nバカ犬\nフェリックス\n閃光のハナテ\nサイトウ専務\nj81654\n塞塔亚\nぼっちアキバ\nりよさん\n日本海郡\n上海证券交易所\nDDtP\n桃天\n黒耀石純度98%\n佐莉奈\n解脱老人卍\nヘレニウム\nのたー\n张立德\nナバン\n福努鲁\nカーン\n天禍夜刀神\n艾伦·玛亚\nトークン\n沙基\n费尔\n長瀬UFO | CookRobidence\nすえぞーちゃんねる\n月次\n宵暗微光\n内科姆皮坦塔\n対称なる混沌\n硬性的\n星屑のアルカ\n香瓜\nウコッケイ\n雷索纳克\nけべなひもす\nウシロミ\nしえな\nnanasi01\nD.A.繁殖

Chapter 23    The Fairy Tale Of Holy Knight Ricca=第 23 章  圣骑士Ricca的童话
The sun feels amazing. Today's weather is perfect!=太阳感觉很好。今天的天气太好了！
I finished picking herbs pretty early today. The magic of the earth must have returned to normal since the Drain Crystals disappeared.=我今天很早就采完了草药。地球的魔力自那以后肯定已经恢复正常了导能水晶它消失了。
The village is almost back to how it was, too...=村子也几乎恢复了原样...
The soldiers from the royal capital rebuilt the houses that burned down, and luckily a lot of the villagers had escaped into the mountains when the monsters attacked...=皇家首都的士兵重建了被烧毁的房屋，幸运的是，当怪物袭击时，许多村民逃到了山里...
*Sigh* Hey, can I talk to you about something, Polon? It's about the statue...=*唉* 嘿，我能和你谈谈吗，Polon？是关于雕像的...
I'm glad that the port town people made it for our village, but Claret demanded that the statue look like me, even when I said I didn't want that...=我很高兴港口镇的人们为我们的村庄而努力，但是Claret 要求雕像看起来像我，即使我说我不想要...
We were supposed to keep the fact that I was the holy knight a secret by saying that the heavenly knight just happened to descend onto this village...=我们应该保持我是唯一的圣骑士 一个秘密，说天上的骑士碰巧来到这个村庄...
Sure, I was kinda full of myself at the port town...but now all the village visitors look at me with wide eyes. It feels awkward.=当然，我在港口小镇时有点自鸣得意...但现在村里所有的游客都睁大眼睛看着我。感觉很尴尬。
I know this statue is only modeled after me, but it's still weird. Although, I would be disappointed if the statue didn't look like me after those long days of posing...=我知道这尊雕像只是模仿我的，但它仍然很奇怪。尽管如此，如果雕像长得不像我，我会很失望...
Couldn't they have done something about the pedestal, though? My face looks scary from this angle...and you can even see my private bits from here...=不过，他们就不能对基座做点什么吗？从这个角度看我的脸很吓人...你甚至可以从这里看到我的私人片段...
Ugh, this is so embarrassing... I shouldn't have agreed to be the model. But Claret was so insistent, so I couldn't say no...=这太尴尬了...我不该同意当模特。但是Claret 太坚持了，所以我不能拒绝...
Maybe I can move the fencing around the statue... If I spread it out a little more, people won't see underneath my skirt...=也许我可以移动雕像周围的围栏...如果我再把它摊开一点，人们就看不到我裙子下面...
Heave-ho...! Oof, oof... Nnnmmmmgh!=举起…啊...！哦，哦...Nnnmmmmgh！
Ugh... I can't pull it out...=呃...我拔不出来...
Huff... Huff... They're too heavy for me to lift up... If I had my holy knight powers, I could lift these up like they were nothing... Ugh...=生气地说生气地说它们太重了，我举不起来...如果我有我的圣骑士 鲍尔斯，我可以把它们举起来，就像它们什么都不是一样...呃...
Oh, Ricca. Hello.=哦Ricca. 你好
Huff... Huff... Uggh...=生气地说生气地说呃...
Woof, woof!=汪，汪！
Polon...? Oh... Hello, Donny...=Polon...？哦你好，唐尼...
You're trying so hard to move the fence... Are you pointlessly trying to deny your own fame today as well? Hahahaha!=你这么努力想移动栅栏...你今天也在毫无意义地否认自己的名声吗？哈哈哈！
Well yeah... It feels like I'm being stared at by everyone. It's embarrassing...=是的...感觉好像每个人都在盯着我看。很尴尬...
Hahaha, I'm sure you'll get used to it after a while.=哈哈哈，我相信你过一会儿就会习惯的。
By the way, we received a notice from the capital that a priest from the western kingdom will be visiting next month. Apparently they'll have lots of people with them, so behave yourself, okay?=顺便说一下，我们收到了首都的通知，一位来自西方王国的牧师将于下个月来访。显然他们会有很多人陪着，所以你要规矩点，好吗？
Ugh... We have more visitors coming to the village than ever. Last month, we even had a group of scholars from the royal capital visit. And the month before that, Claret's parents and a bunch of other mages came...=呃...我们村来的游客比以往任何时候都多。上个月，我们甚至邀请了一群来自皇家首都的学者到访。而在那之前的一个月，Claret'他的父母和一群其他法师来了...
You know they stare at my face while I show them around the town, right?=他们盯着我的脸看，对吧？
*Sigh* Just thinking about it is making my face flush...=*唉* 一想到这就让我脸红...
I do understand how you feel, but my shop's been doing great because of all of the outsiders that you and that stone statue have been attracting.=我确实理解你的感受，但我的商店一直做得很好，因为你和那尊石像吸引了所有的外来者。
I'm sure my husband is really happy about it too.=我相信我丈夫也很高兴。
Ma'am...=太太...
You want Miria to be proud, right? Then do your best with dealing with the priest and his followers. I'm sure the shop'll make lots of money, so I'll lower your rent.=你想要Miria 骄傲，对吧？然后尽最大努力与牧师和他的追随者打交道。我相信这家商店会赚很多钱，所以我会降低你的租金。
*Sigh* I'll do my best...=*唉* 我会尽力的...
Miria, I'm home!=Miria, 我回来了！
Welcome home, Ricca.=欢迎回家，Ricca.
Heehee... The tomato salad you made was delicious.=嘿嘿...你做的番茄沙拉很好吃。
Heehee, I'm glad.=嘿嘿，我很高兴。
Hey Ricca, I got this from a customer over at the dining hall.=嘿Ricca, 我从餐厅的一位顾客那里得到了这个。
Ack... Another figure of me... How many of those things have you been gifted so far...?=确认...我的另一个身影...到目前为止，你有多少这样的天赋...？
This is the 12th one now...I think? People that went into town saw them on sale there, so they brought some back.=这是第12次了...我想？进城的人看到他们在那里打折，所以他们带了一些回来。
That's like two figures every month... These must be pretty expensive, too. They're so detailed...=每月大概两位数...这些肯定也很贵。它们太详细了...
They really are well-made... They seem to be really popular in town as well. Apparently people are buying one per home, and using them as a ward against monsters.=他们真的做得很好...他们似乎在城里也很受欢迎。显然，人们正在每户购买一套，并将其用作抵御怪物的保护区。
Hehe, I'm so proud that everyone has recognized what you've done...=呵呵，我很自豪大家都认识到了你的所作所为...
One in each home...? I do think they're well-made, but maybe a little too well-made...=每家一个...？我确实认为它们做得很好，但可能做得有点太好了...
Hey...! The tummy has a red marking painted on it...! Only Claret would know about this...! She must be the one making these figures...=嘿肚子上画了一个红色的标记...！只有Claret 我会知道的...！她一定是做这些数字的人...
Claret really likes you, doesn't she? Actually, she came by a while back when you were out and asked me to give you to her.=Claret 她真的很喜欢你，不是吗？事实上，你出去的时候她过来让我把你交给她。
Wha... Claret...wants me...?=什么...Claret...想要我...？
Yes. She looked really serious about it... I did think it was about time for you to finally leave the nest, so I promised that I'd give you to her.=对她看起来真的很认真...我确实认为你终于该离开巢穴了，所以我答应把你给她。
What!? Miria... Why would you say that? Claret is always in my personal space and staring at me... Now that you've promised her that, my heart's going to give out from beating too fast...!=什么Miria... 你为什么这么说？Claret 总是在我的私人空间里看着我...既然你答应了她，我的心脏会因为跳得太快而衰竭...！
Haha, I'm joking... Claret likes you a lot, but she wouldn't say something like that...I think.=哈哈，我在开玩笑...Claret 很喜欢你，但她不会这么说...我想。
Oh Miria, you meanie! You're the one who needs to stop doting over me and get married already!=哦Miria, 你真刻薄！你才是那个需要停止溺爱我的人，赶快结婚吧！
Get married... You're right...=结婚你说得对...
Will you be alright...? Even if I leave...?=你没事吧...？即使我离开...？
Huh... I'll be fine... It's totally fine! I've been wanting more independence for a while now!=呵呵...我会没事的...很好！一段时间以来，我一直想要更多的独立！
Actually...that reminds me of someone...=事实上这让我想起了某个人...
Someone...?=某人
He helped me when Archlich stabbed me in the cave, and I've been to visit him a few times to show my thanks... He lives near the sea, but occasionally comes to visit the village.=阿奇利希在山洞里捅了我一刀，他帮了我，我也去过几次次 为了表达我的感谢...他住在海边，但偶尔也来看看这个村子。
Ah, but don't tell anyone, okay...?=啊，但不要告诉任何人，好吗...？
Miria... I didn't realize at all... Heehee... You can finally stop worrying about me and focus on yourself.=Miria... 我根本没意识到...嘿嘿...你终于可以不再担心我了，专注于你自己。
Yes... But, I'm still torn... You'll be lonely if I leave the village, right?=对但是，我还是很伤心...如果我离开村子，你会感到孤独，对吗？
So, I wanted to think about it a bit more after things had settled down... We were apart for so long, after all...=所以，我想在事情安定下来后再考虑一下...毕竟我们分开太久了...
I-I... I won't feel too sad. I could just visit you at the port town on my way to Claret's place...=我…我...我不会觉得太难过。我可以在去伦敦的路上去港口看你Claret'那地方...
It might be a ways away...but I can still visit you whenever I want! I won't be lonely at all...! I swear!=可能还有很长的路要走...但我还是可以随时来看你！我一点也不会孤单...！我发誓！
Really...? I'll...really miss you, though... I'm still a little unsure, so you don't need to be strong for my sake, you know?=真正地我会...但我真的很想你...我还是有点不确定，所以你不需要为了我而坚强，你知道吗？
Maybe I would be a little lonely...=也许我会有点孤独...
No... You've been by my side all my life. Of course I'll be sad if we live apart...=其.. 你一辈子都在我身边。如果我们分开住我当然会难过...
Hehe, I thought so... Yeah... I'll be really sad too... I'll guess I'll ask him to wait for a while...=呵呵，我想是的...是 啊我也会很难过...我想我会让他等一会儿...
Ah... I can't do that... I'll have to say goodbye to him properly...=啊...我不能那样做...我得好好跟他道别了...
No, Miria... You shouldn't make him wait... This is the man you were talking to at the dining hall about a month ago, right? He seemed kind...=不Miria... 你不应该让他等...这就是一个月前你在餐厅跟他说话的那个人，对吧？他看起来很善良...
Heehee... And you looked like you were having so much fun talking to him... It was clear to me you'd found someone good for you...=嘿嘿...你看起来和他谈话很开心...我很清楚你找到了一个适合你的人...
So...even if I do feel lonely, I'll be okay. Claret comes to visit and buy herbs sometimes, and helping out at the store and doing tours of the village can be hard work, but it's also fun...=所以即使我感到孤独，我也会没事的。Claret 来拜访并购买一些草药次, 在商店里帮忙，在村子里旅游都是很辛苦的工作，但也很有趣...
And...I'll be happy knowing you're happy, Miria! So don't worry about me!=和我很高兴知道你很开心，Miria! 所以别担心我！
Heehee... You don't have to look after me anymore. Congratulations.=嘿嘿...你不必再照顾我了。祝贺
Zzz... Zzz... Zzz...=Zzz...Zzz...Zzz...
Nngh... Miri...a... Nngh... Hmm...=嗯...米莉...A.嗯...嗯...
*Sniff* Ugh... *Sniff* Oww...=*嗅嗅*嗅嗅……哦...
New stage "Lost Chapter Miria" has been unlocked.=“新阶段”遗失的章节 Miria“已经解锁。
New stage "Epilogue 1 Ricca Thereafter" has been unlocked.=新阶段“结语1”Ricca的后来“已经解锁。
Epilogue 1=结语1
——————————————————————————————————【主线】第二十三话结束——————————————————————————————


————————————————————————————————————【NOVEL】第二十三话-莉卡的昆虫宝宝出生开始————————————————————————————————
It had been three hours since Ricca had set off for the World of Darkness.=从那以后已经三个小时了Ricca 已经出发去了黑暗的世界。
We had waited at the top of the tower for Ricca and Iris to return.=我们在塔顶等了好几个小时Ricca 和Iris 回来。
After a while, the ground had begun to shake so hard we thought the tower would collapse, so we ran back through the still monster-infested castle and hurriedly escaped.=过了一会儿，地面开始剧烈摇晃，我们以为塔楼会倒塌，于是我们跑回了仍然布满怪物的城堡，匆匆逃走。
Miria had been turned back into a human by Ricca's holy knight powers and I was nearly completely out of magic, but the soldiers protected us as we fled.=Miria 被人变成了人类Ricca's圣骑士 鲍尔斯和我几乎完全失去了魔法，但士兵们在我们逃跑时保护了我们。
As we watch from a distance as the castle falls, a gigantic snake-like monster appears, heralded by a massive surge of magical energy.=当我们从远处观看城堡倒塌时，一个巨大的蛇形怪物出现了，预示着巨大的魔法能量激增。
Ghhh... Aaah... Everyone... I'm...sorry...=啊...啊...每个人我是很抱歉
Aah... Ricca...!=啊...Ricca...!
The Darkfiend Dragon emerges from the gate, which had appeared amidst the ruins of the castle.=黑暗的龙从城堡废墟中出现的大门中出现。
The jet-black necromancer stands atop the Darkfiend Dragon's head, a girl with shining angel wings bound by tentacles dangling below him.=黑色的亡灵巫师站在黑暗的龙的头上，一个女孩有着闪亮的天使翅膀，被他下面悬挂的触手绑着。
Mwahaha! If you hadn't come tumbling into the stomach of the Darkfiend Dragon, I wouldn't have been able to steal your magic and would have perished as well.=姆瓦哈！如果你没有跌入黑暗之龙的胃里，我就无法偷走你的魔法，也会因此而死亡。
It seems that it was worth praying from the depth of my soul that the dragon would eat the holy knight.=从我的灵魂深处，我似乎值得祈祷，那条龙会吃掉我的灵魂圣骑士.
No... Archlich...=其.. 阿奇Ricca...
Ricca...defeated...?=Ricca...打败了...？
Ghaaaah... Gggh... Uuuuuugh...=哎呀...啊...嗯...
Ricca can barely breathe because of the tentacles wrapped around her neck, white foam leaking from the edges of her mouth.=Ricca 她脖子上缠着触手，嘴边冒出白色泡沫，几乎无法呼吸。
The holy knight's stomach... I-Is that also Archlich's doing...? She became like that because she lost...=这个圣骑士'他的胃...这也是Archlich在做的吗...？她变成那样是因为她失去了...
Her stomach is swollen as if pregnant, and something could be seen squirming and wriggling under the skin.=她的肚子肿得像怀孕了一样，可以看到皮肤下有东西在蠕动。
I instinctively realize that she has been impregnated with some sort of monster.=我本能地意识到她怀上了某种怪物。
You really got in my way back at the tower, humans... Mwahahaha...! I have something to give you!=你真的挡了我回塔的路，人类...哈哈哈...！我有东西要给你！
I raise my staff in preparation, thinking this is an attack. However, the object falls short, landing and rolling to a stop a little in front of us.=我提高了工作人员的准备，认为这是一次袭击。然而，这个物体落了下来，在我们前面一点的地方停了下来。
We flinch as Archlich turns to face us, throwing a small, red object in our direction.=当阿奇Ricca转身面对我们时，我们退缩了，向我们的方向扔了一个红色的小东西。
What lays there is the blood-soaked corpse of a fairy... It is Iris' body, torn in two.=躺在那里的是一具被鲜血浸透的妖精尸体...它是Iris' 尸体被撕成两半。
Eeek... Ah, aaaah...=哎呀...啊，啊...
Aghaaa... Uuugh... I...ris... Gggh, aaah...=阿加哈...呃...我里斯...哎呀...
Mwahahaha! Human comrades of this little girl... That's not my only present for you!=哈哈哈！这个小女孩的人类同志们...这不是我给你的唯一礼物！
Archlich spreads his arms, releasing an intense dark aura from his whole body.=阿奇Ricca张开双臂，全身散发出强烈的黑暗气息。
Eeeeeek...!=嘿嘿...！
Gggha... Aaaaaaaaaagh...!=哈哈...aaaaaaaagh...！
It strikes Ricca, who is bound nearby. Her expression grows more pained and her belly undulates and throbs.=它击中Ricca, 他就在附近。她的表情变得更加痛苦，腹部起伏和悸动。
Haaa... Aaaah, it's moving...inside... Nnngh... Haaah, eek, hhhgh... Aaaaah...! Hhheeek... Aaagh... My womb is being...spread open...=哈...啊，它在移动...在…内嗯...哈哈哈...啊啊...！哈哈哈...啊...我的子宫是...张开...

Eeek... Aaah... ! Please stop...=哎呀...啊！请停止...

I'm home!=我回来了！
They're kinda gross...but I should be able to handle slimes by myself, right?=它们有点恶心...但我自己应该能处理史莱姆，应该吧？
She might even tell me never to go into the mountains again.=她甚至可能会叫我再也别上山了。
And so is Miria... She's going to get really scared if I tell her that I saw a monster, too...=Miria也是...如果我告诉她我也看到了怪物，她会吓坏的...
Mister merchant is going to be disappointed in me...=商人先生会对我失望的...
*Sigh*=*叹息*
They move pretty slow, so I could just run away if it gets dangerous, and I should get rid of them before they attack anyone else. I don't want Miria treating me like a kid forever, either.=它们移动得很慢，所以如果有危险的话我可以逃跑，我应该在它们攻击其他人之前把它们赶走。我也不想Miria永远把我当孩子看待。
I remember watching mister merchant drive them away by hitting them with a stick, too...=我记得我也曾看着商人先生用棒子打他们，把他们赶走...
But there are so many of them... No, if I don't get rid of them now, they're going to attack the village's livestock and children.=但是这么多小怪物...不，如果我现在不除掉它们，它们会攻击村子里的牲畜和孩子。
Wh-What's with that pillar of light? It came out of nowhere... I think it's made of magic...=那根光柱是怎么回事？不知从哪里冒出来的...像是用魔法做成的一般...
Once I'm back at the village, I need to drop these herbs off at the general store.=我一回到村子，就得把这些草药送到杂货店。
Oh, hey Ricca. Hiya.=哦，嘿Ricca. 你好。
Here are the herbs you asked for.=这是你要的药草。
Hahahah... Here we go again...=哈哈哈...又开张啰...
Great, thank you always! How were the mountains? Did you see any monsters? I heard they're pretty restless lately...=很好，谢谢你总是这么给力！山里的情况如何？ 你看到什么怪物了吗？ 我听说它们最近很不安分...
There were a lot of slimes, but I was able to defeat them by hitting them with a stick, just like you did that time.=有很多史莱姆，但我能用棒子击打它们，就像你当时做的那样。
Really? There were slimes...? Are you injured, Ricca?=真的吗？有史莱姆...？你受伤了没有，Ricca?
Heehee, no need to worry. I was strong enough to beat them myself. See? Hyah! Hyah! Take that!=嘿嘿，不用担心。我足够强壮，可以自己打败他们。看好了，嗨！嗨！拿着吧！
That's impressive... But you still ought to be careful. If something happened to you, Miss Miria is going to get mad at me for sending you off on the errand in the first place.=真行啊你...但你还是要小心。如果你出了什么事，Miria小姐会生我的气的，因为一开始就派你去出差。
Ahahaha, everyone's a worrywart just like Miria... Oh, that's right...!=哈哈，每个人都像Miria一样忧心忡忡...哦，没错...！
I collected some Magic Stones while I was out picking the herbs. I wanted to buy something for Miria.=我在外面采药的时候收集了一些魔法石。我想给Miria买点东西。
Alright, just leave those here then. Give me a minute so I can count them.=好吧，那就把这些留在这儿吧。给我点时间，让我数一数。
Okay!=可以！
Hmm... Should I get her snacks, or something else...?=哼唔...我该给她买点零食还是别的什么...？
Be careful...=小心...
Oh, what's this gem? It's a necklace... It's so cute...!=哦，这是什么宝石？是条项链...太可爱了...！
Hm? Oh, that. I got it from a young mage girl earlier today in exchange for some medicinal herbs.=嗯？哦，那个。今天早些时候，我从一个年轻的法师女孩那里得到了它，以换取一些草药。
(<indent%3D0.4em>A mage girl...? I wonder if she made the magic sign I saw on the mountain path, too...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>一个法师女孩...？我想知道她是否也做了我在山路上看到的魔法符号...）
Heehee, I bet Miria would look really pretty with this necklace...=嘻嘻，我打赌Miria戴上这条项链一定会很漂亮...

Ugh, why'd she have to say that...? W-Well... I probably got the wrong idea.=她为什么要这么说...？嗯...我可能想错了。
One, ten, hundred, thousand... Urk...=一、十、百、千...哦吼...
I see... But still...I think I can splurge a bit. How much is this necklace again?=我明白了...但还是...我想我可以奢侈一下。 这条项链多少钱来着？
Ricca, do you want that necklace?=Ricca, 你想要那条项链吗？
Go on, you can take it. I'll give it to you in exchange for the Magic Stones.=去吧，你可以拿着。我把它给你，以换取魔法石。

Huh? Yes... Oh, but... I can't...=昂？是呢...喔，但是，我不能...
It's fine. You're always helping out at my store, and you're going to give that to Miss Miria, right? Ghaha! I'd love to see that necklace on her as well.=没事。你总是在我的店里帮忙，你会把这个给Miria小姐，对吗？哈哈！我也想看看她戴项链。
Oh, mister... You really mean it?=哦，先生...你是认真的吗？

Okay! I'll be back tomorrow to help out again. See you, mister!=好的！我明天再来帮忙。 再见，先生！
Hahaha, out you go! I'll have you look after the store tomorrow.=哈哈哈，走吧！明天我会让你照看这家商店。
Eek! Mister! Don't hit my butt!=哎呀！先生！别打我屁股！
Ghahaha! You're growing into a busty lady too! Say hello to Miria for me!=哈哈哈！你也在长成一个丰满的女子！代我向Miria问好！

Oh, Ricca, you're back from the mountains.=哦，Ricca，你从山上回来了啊。
Oh, hello, ma'am. Excuse me, I need to get going.=你好，女士。对不起，我得走了。

Hey, what happened to the necklace that was here?=嘿，这个项链是啥情况？
Oh, the one with the gem? I, um, gave it to Ricca...=哦，有宝石的那个？ 我，嗯，我把它给了Ricca...

Alright, I'll forgive you for giving it to Ricca. I appreciate her for always helping out at the store, but...=好吧，我会原谅你把它送给Ricca，我很感激她总是在店里帮忙，但是...
Why have you been calling her sister "Miss" Miria lately?=你最近为什么叫她姐姐“Miria小姐”？
And you know what people call that gem you gave her, too, don't you!?=你也知道人们怎么称呼你给她的宝石吧！？
Well...I was talking about it in front of the church... I mean, at the dining hall... A busty girl like Miria could easily get a guy to marry if she just dressed sexier...=这个额...我在教堂前谈论这件事...我是说，在餐厅...像Miria这样的胸部丰满的女孩，只要打扮得更性感点，就很容易找到男人结婚...
Busty girl... Marry...? Don't stick your nose into other people's business, you perverted old man!=胸部丰满的女孩...？别插手别人的终身大事，你这个变态老头！
Eek...! Sorry! I didn't mean it like that!=哎呀...！很抱歉！我不是那个意思！
Those girls have been through a lot, though...=那些女孩经历了很多，不过...
Their parents died in the epidemic only two years after Ricca was born. But I guess that's what happens when a herb picker tries to play doctor...=她们的父母在Ricca出生两年后死于疫情。但我猜当一个采药者试图扮演医生时就会发生这种情况...
Back then, Miria was even younger than Ricca is now, but she was so put together.=那时，Miria甚至比现在的Ricca年少，但她是如此完美。
The town chipped in some money, but Miria raised Ricca pretty much on her own... I'm sure she wanted to have fun like most teenage girls, too.=镇上凑了些钱，但Miria基本上是靠她自己拉扯大了Ricca...我相信她也想和大多数十几岁的女孩一样，开开心心的。
She could've relied on others a little more...but I guess there weren't many people to rely on back then, either. A lot of people got sick.=她本可以再依赖别人一点...但我想当时也没有多少人可以依靠。很多人都生病了。
Yeah... And then some people started blaming the epidemic on Miria's family. They said that they brought the sickness when they moved in, or that someone as pretty as Miria must be a witch or a succubus...=是 啊...然后一些人开始将疫情归咎于Miria的家人。他们说她们搬进来的时候带来了疾病，或者像Miria这样漂亮的人一定是女巫或魅魔...
How ridiculous. It's far more likely that the sickness was brought in by some traveler.=真是荒唐！我看呐，这种病更有可能是由一些旅行者带来的。
Exactly. As proof, I'm healthy as can be, and I've been close to them all this time! I gave the asshole who started the rumor a good punch in the face.=确实如此。我可作证，我一直都很接近她们，而我如此健康！我狠狠地打了那个造谣的混蛋的脸。
That was so wonderful what you did... I wouldn't have fallen for you if it weren't for that.=你做的太棒了...如果不是因为这个，我不会爱上你的。
Ghahaha... Right? I used to feel so sorry for Miria back then, it was hard to even look at her. Even though she had those amazing breasts and ass...=哈哈哈...是么？正当那时，我对Miria的事很难过，甚至很难直视她。尽管她有着惊人的胸部和屁股...
But Ricca's all grown up now. It's about time Miria settled down, so I gave her that necklace as my way of supporting her, okay? It was a pure, kindhearted gesture...=但是Ricca现在都长大了。Miria该安顿下来了，所以我给了她那条项链作为我支持她的方式，好吗？这是一个纯洁、善良的表示...
And I'm telling you her private life is none of your business, pervert! And you were lying about how she seemed down, too!=我告诉你，她的私生活不关你的事，变态！你还撒谎说她看起来情绪低落！
Maybe it has something to do with how the monsters are getting restless... No, probably just a coincidence.=也许这与怪物们变得不安有关...不，可能只是巧合。
A lot of strange things have been happening lately... A bunch of slimes appeared, magical letters written in light came out of nowhere, and now I find a brooch and a doll...=最近发生了很多奇怪的事情...一堆史莱姆冒了出来，在光柱写下的魔法浮空字不知从哪里冒了出来，现在我又发现了一枚胸针和一个洋娃娃...
After I make up with Miria, I'll ask her to teach me how to make a little dress for her.=在我和Miria和好之后，我会让她教我如何为她做一件小裙子。
Hmm... This fairy doll is cute, but a little too risque... It would be kinda awkward to use her as an ornament in the house...=呃...这个妖精娃娃很可爱，但有伤风化...把她当作家里的装饰品会有点尴尬...

Well, if a traveler dropped this, I bet he'll stop by the village, so it's fine if I take these back with me for now, right?=好吧，如果一个旅行者丢了这个，我估计他会在村子附近停下来，所以我现在把这些带回去也没关系，对吧？
A brooch and a doll... I wonder if someone dropped them. But people from the village rarely come this way...=胸针和洋娃娃...我想知道是不是有人掉了。但是村里的人很少走这条路...

If I just eat more, they'll get bigger in no time... Hey, what am I even talking about? Hehehe...=如果我多吃点，它们很快就会变大...哎呦，我到底在说什么？呵呵嘿...
I-I mean, I think my breasts are pretty big, too... I'm sure they'll grow more! I'm Miria's sister, after all!=我，我觉得吧，我的胸部也很大...我相信它们会长大的！我毕竟是Miria的妹妹！
Oh, for a little doll, her breasts are big. They might be as big as Miria's if she was human-sized...=哦，对一个小娃娃来说，她的胸部挺大呀。如果Miria和人类一样大的话...

<b>Weak and strong attacks</b>\r\n Attacking while standing still will allow you to unleash quick weak attacks\r\n and attacking while moving will allow you to unleash strong attacks.\r\n Strong attacks are slow and tend to leave you vulnerable\r\n so be sure to watch your enemy's movements closely before using them.=<b>弱攻击和强攻击</b>\r\n 站着不动的时候进行攻击以发动快速的弱攻击\n移动的时候进行攻击以发动强大的攻击。\n强攻击很缓慢，往往会让你有破绽\n所以在使用之前，一定要仔细观察敌人的行动。

<b>Life Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting red heart crystals\r\n will restore your HP.=<b>生命水晶</b>\r\n 收集红心水晶\n将恢复你的HP。
<b>Game over</b>\r\n When Ricca is defeated by a monster,\r\n the remaining number of Continues will decrease.\r\n You can see how many continues you have from the pause menu.\r\n (It's the number next to the sword icon in the top-right)\r\n When your remaining number of continues hits 0,\r\n it'll be game over and you'll be returned to the stage select menu.=<b>游戏失败</b>\r\n Ricca 被怪物打败时，\n继续重试的次数将减少。\n可以从暂停菜单中查看\n（右上角剑图标旁边的数字）\n当你剩余的继续次数达到0时，\n再次游戏失败后，你将返回关卡选择菜单。

Chapter 1    Emissary of Sunlight=第一章    阳光使者
-----------------------补加文本
Inside the castle lived a giant bird that turned people into stone. Nevertheless, the knight used the large sword gifted to him by God and defeated the bird.=城堡里住着一只巨大的鸟，它把人变成了石头。尽管如此，骑士还是用上帝赐予他的大剑消灭了此鸟。
When the knight reached the top of the castle, the evil wizard appeared along with an ominous light. The wizard spoke...=当骑士到达城堡顶部时，邪恶的巫师出现了，伴随着不祥的光芒。巫师说...
"Servant of God! Holy Knight! You must be a fool to come challenging me! I will defeat you and take over your body!"=“上帝的仆人！圣骑士！你来挑战我，真是个彪子！我会拿下你，接管你的身体！”
But the knight was unfazed by the evil wizard's words. Before he finished talking, the knight cut the wizard in half with his sword!=但是骑士并没有被邪恶巫师的话吓到。还没说完，骑士就用剑把巫师切成了两半！
"Ghaaaah! Ooooh nooo! I am defeated!"=“嘎啊啊啊！哦哦哦哦不不不！我被打败了！”

The knight defeated the evil wizard, but suddenly, he heard the wizard's voice.=骑士打败了邪恶的巫师，但突然，他听到了巫师的声音。
"How unfair! You attacked me while I was speaking!"=“太不公平了！我说话的时候你还攻击我！”
"But you won't beat me that easily. In exchange for my life, I will summon a great, powerful dragon from the World of Darkness and use him to crush you!"=“但你不会那么容易打败我的。作为我生命的交换，我会从黑暗世界召唤一条强大的巨龙，用它来粉碎你！”
Darkness surrounded the area and a dragon even bigger than the castle appeared in front of the knight. The dragon opened his mouth and tried to swallow the knight.=黑暗包围了这片区域，一条比城堡还要大的龙出现在骑士面前。龙张开嘴试图吞下骑士。

Heehee... However, the knight had God's holy power on his side.=嘿嘿...然而，骑士拥有上帝的神圣力量。
He collected that power in his sword, made it shine bright like the sun, and pierced it into the dragon.=他在剑中会聚了这种力量，使它像太阳一样闪闪发光，并用其刺向阿龙。
The holy power struck the dragon. Its light was unbearable for the creature who lived in darkness.=神圣的力量击中了龙。它的光对生活在黑暗中的生物来说是无法忍受的。
The dragon gave up on swallowing the knight and left to return to the World of Darkness.=龙放弃了吞下骑士的念头，回到了黑暗的世界。
And so, thanks to the brave act of the holy knight sent from heaven, the wicked wizard was defeated, the evil dragon was sent back to the World of Darkness, and everyone was saved.=故而，由于来自天堂的圣骑士之勇，邪恶的巫师被击败，邪恶的龙被送回黑暗的世界，所有人都得救了。

I went around the village again, but other than the two we found earlier, I didn't find any humans alive.=我又去村里看了一遍，除了那两个人以外，村里已经没有人活着了。
I couldn't...find Miria... Where did she...?=姐姐...在哪里...到处都找不到...
Maybe she was out of the village when the goblins attacked, just like me... Yeah, that has to be it...=也许哥布林袭击的时候她不在村子里，就像我一样...是的，一定是这样的吧...
U-Um... Ricca...?=嗯...小Ricca...?
Oh... Ma'am...=哦...太太...
You're hurt... Are you okay?=你受伤了...你没事吧？
Yes... It isn't too bad. Don't worry.=是的...还不错。别担心。
Looks like all the monsters are gone from the village.=看起来所有的怪物都离开了村子。
Donny... Should you even be moving...?=Donny...你还能出征吗...？
Hahaha... Well, I don't think I have a choice. I'm fine.=哈哈哈...我想我别无选择。我很好。
...and then the next thing I knew, I was enveloped in white light at the church, and I transformed into this form...=...我就知道，我在教堂里被白光包围，变成了这个样子...
I can't believe it... It's just like a fairy tale...=难以置信...就像童话一样...
But I guess I have to believe you after seeing that fairy...=但我想，在看到那个妖精后，我必须相信你...
I saw them... I saw the goblins take away a girl with chestnut-colored hair from the direction of the church...=我看见他们了...我看见哥布林从教堂方向带走了一个栗色头发的女孩...
Wha...!? Ma'am, is that true!?=什么...！？阿姨，这是真的吗！？
Y-Yes... Those clothes... That hair... It had to be Miria...!=是的...那衣服...那头发...一定是Miria...!
That's right... Miria said she was going to clean the church in the afternoon... B-But what would the goblins want from her...?=这么说来...Miria说她下午要打扫教堂...但是哥布林们想从她那里得到什么...？
I'm sorry... I wasn't sure about it at the time, and I was too shocked to bring it up until now...=我很抱歉...当时我不确定，我太震惊了，直到现在才提起...
That goblin leader was trying to capture you, too. I don't know what their taste in girls is...but if your sister's a young woman, it wouldn't be strange of them to kidnap her.=那个哥布林首领也试图抓住你。我不知道她们对女孩的品味...但你姐姐是个年轻女子，他们绑架她也不奇怪。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Young woman... Are they going to assault Miria...just like they assaulted me in the church...? No...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>年轻女子...他们要袭击Miria吗...就像他们在教堂里袭击我一样...？不......）
Ricca... Please... Please save Miria from the goblins...!=Ricca... 请，请从哥布林手中救救Miria...！
I think you should go looking for her too. You defeated that rock monster by the village entrance, right? If you were able to take him on, I'm sure you can save Miria.=我想你应该去找她。你在村门口打败了那个岩石怪物，如此之力，我相信你能救Miria。
Those goblins came from the foot of the mountain. They must be the same group that attacked the settlement there, too. You might be able to get some information from the settlers.=那些哥布林是从山麓那边来的。他们肯定也袭击了定居点的那群人。你也许能从定居者那里得到一些信息。
The settlement...at the foot of the mountain... O-Okay...=定居点...在山麓...知道了...
Um... Are you two going to stay in the village...? There might still be monsters around here...=嗯...你们俩要留在村子里吗...？这附近可能还有怪物...
...I think I saw some people flee into the mountains, so we're going to look for them and join them.=...我想我看到一些人逃进了山里，我去找他们会合。
I'm not as strong as you...but I can take on a goblin or two by myself.=我没有你强...但我可以自己对付一两个哥布林。
Go on, Ricca... Find Miria and save her.=去吧，Ricca... 早点去救Miria罢。
But... I can't leave you two alone... And what'll happen to the village and the bodies of the people who died...?=但是我不能丢下你们两个...村庄和遇难者的尸体会怎么样...？
Ricca, listen to what your elders tell you. The good little Ricca I know always listens to grown ups.=Ricca, 听听长辈们的话。我知道好孩子Ricca总是听大人的。
I'm sorry... I'm... I'm going to go look for Miria... *Sniff* I'm sorry...=我很抱歉...我是，我要去找Miria... *吸*，对不起...
It's okay, Ricca. Miria's your precious sister, isn't she?=没关系，Ricca。Miria不是你的宝贝姐姐吗？
I know how often she prayed at church. God must have transformed you into that form so you could save her.=她经常在教堂祈祷。一定是神明为了帮助你姐才把你变成那样子的。
Yes, ma'am...=哇哦...
(<indent%3D0.4em>A note and the keys to the house... I'll leave these here in case Miria and I just missed each other and she comes home later...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>一张便条和房子的钥匙...我把这些留在这儿以免Miria 进不来。我只是盼望她待会儿就回家......）
Chapter 2    The Kidnapped Maiden=第 2 章    被绑架的少女
Its movements are slow...but be careful. It's far more durable than other monsters you've fought. Even as a holy knight, you'll suffer a lot of damage if its large arms destroy your armor.=它的动作很慢...但要小心。它比你遇到过的其他怪物更耐揍。即使成为圣骑士, 如果它巨大的手臂摧毁了汝之盔甲，你会大残。
Okay... I got it!=好啦...收到!
It's rolling this way!? It's fast! You're going to get run over!=滚来这边了！？太快了！小心被压死的！
Calm down and cool your head. Watch its moves closely!=冷静下来，冷静下来。仔细观察它的动作！
R-Right... If I let this monster in the village, it's going to wreck everyone's homes!=窝...草...如果此妖孽突破防线，残存的家园皆且为所毁！

Huh...? H-Hey...you're right... It hurts, but it's bearable... Still... Oof... I can't shake his grip!=呵...？嗯...你说得对...很痛，但可以忍受...还...哦...我摇不动他的手！
I thought you'd be strong enough with your holy knight's strength, but I guess you still need my help... I'll go attack the golem at its core.=我以为你有了圣骑士之力会很坚强，但是我看你还是需要我的帮助...我去攻击石像鬼的核心。

Oof... The goblin wearing armor told the golem to break my joints so I don't escape... He was trying to follow his orders, but he couldn't crush me with his hands... Can it be he intends to break me from the inside...?=哦...穿着盔甲的哥布林告诉傀儡要打断我的关节，这样我就不会逃跑了...他试图从令，但无法用手压碎我...是不是打算从里面把我打断...？
No! D-Don't! You'll kill me! You'll kill me if you do that! Please! I won't struggle anymore... I'll obey, so please, I'm begging you... Stoooop!=不！不，不要！你会杀了我的！如果你那样做，我就没命了啊！求求你了！我不会再挣扎了...我会服从的，求你了，我求你了...停停停停！

(<indent%3D0.4em>Why... Why is this...happening to me...? Why did it have to be me...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>为什么...为什么这事情...发生在我身上...？为什么一定是我…？）
